projects.title: The Android App Market on Google Play
projects.description: Mobile apps are everywhere. They are easy to create and can be lucrative. Because of these two factors, more and more apps are being developed. In this notebook, we will do a comprehensive analysis of the Android app market by comparing over ten thousand apps in Google Play across different categories. We'll look for insights in the data to devise strategies to drive growth and retention.

projects.title: The GitHub History Of Scala Language
projects.description: With almost 30k commits and a history spanning over ten years, Scala is a mature programming language. It is a general-purpose programming language that has recently become another prominent language for data scientists.Scala is also an open source project. Open source projects have the advantage that their entire development histories -- who made changes, what was changed, code reviews, etc. -- are publicly available.

projects.title: TV, halftime shows, and the Big Game
projects.description: Whether or not you like football, the Super Bowl is a spectacle. There's a little something for everyone at your Super Bowl party. Drama in the form of blowouts, comebacks, and controversy for the sports fan. There are the ridiculously expensive ads, some hilarious, others gut-wrenching, thought-provoking, and weird. The half-time shows with the biggest musicians in the world, sometimes riding giant mechanical tigers or leaping from the roof of the stadium. It's a show, baby. And in this notebook, we're going to find out how some of the elements of this show interact with each other. After exploring and cleaning our data a little, we're going to answer questions like:What are the most extreme game outcomes?How does the game affect television viewership?How have viewership, TV ratings, and ad cost evolved over time?Who are the most prolific musicians in terms of halftime show performances?

Collaborating with leading brands to design and implement impactful retail branding opportunities at Cashify’s offline stores and kiosks.

Developing branding strategies that enhance customer experience and strengthen brand presence in the re-commerce ecosystem.

This role allows me to bridge creative branding with operational efficiency, delivering value both to partner brands and to Cashify’s retail growth strategy.

experience.title: Financial Analyst
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Managed and tracked client-level financial workbooks, overseeing revenues, costs, and expenses in compliance with SOWs and SLA requirements‚Ä¢ Assisted in budgeting and forecasting processes, leading to around 10% improvement in forecast accuracy across client programs‚Ä¢ Ensured accurate and timely financial close activities monthly, optimizing the reporting of delivery costs‚Ä¢ Developed comprehensive financial reporting packages, conducting insightful analytics on key performance trends that contributed to an overall substantial increase in client profitability‚Ä¢ Prepared detailed program cost reports, encompassing accounts payment activity, labor, subcontractors, and other related costs‚Ä¢ Conducted rigorous financial analyses of client performance, providing unbiased reports and strategic recommendations to management‚Ä¢ The reporting was made directly to the finance director offshore‚Ä¢ Monitored and analyzed client business performance by region, implementing financial strategies that drove a significant increase in regional revenue growth‚Ä¢ Conducted comprehensive financial analysis, including income statements, balance sheet and cash flow to assess financial health and performance at corporate level‚Ä¢ Developed advanced financial models and scenarios for data-driven decision making‚Ä¢ Analysed cost structures, Identifying cost reduction and operational efficiency opportunities‚Ä¢ Ensured compliance with financial regulations (GAAP/IFRS) and reporting Requirements‚Ä¢ Collaborated effectively with cross functional teams to interpret and communicate financial data.
experience.description_html:
• Managed and tracked client-level financial workbooks, overseeing revenues, costs, and expenses in compliance with SOWs and SLA requirements
• Assisted in budgeting and forecasting processes, leading to around 10% improvement in forecast accuracy across client programs
• Ensured accurate and timely financial close activities monthly, optimizing the reporting of delivery costs
• Developed comprehensive financial reporting packages, conducting insightful analytics on key performance trends that contributed to an overall substantial increase in client profitability
• Prepared detailed program cost reports, encompassing accounts payment activity, labor, subcontractors, and other related costs
• Conducted rigorous financial analyses of client performance, providing unbiased reports and strategic recommendations to management
• The reporting was made directly to the finance director offshore
• Monitored and analyzed client business performance by region, implementing financial strategies that drove a significant increase in regional revenue growth
• Conducted comprehensive financial analysis, including income statements, balance sheet and cash flow to assess financial health and performance at corporate level
• Developed advanced financial models and scenarios for data-driven decision making
• Analysed cost structures, Identifying cost reduction and operational efficiency opportunities
• Ensured compliance with financial regulations (GAAP/IFRS) and reporting Requirements
• Collaborated effectively with cross functional teams to interpret and communicate financial data.

experience.title: Associate Analyst financial planning and analysis
experience.description: Oversaw accounts reconciliation via ARCS system and contributed to profit planning, leading to improved financial forecasting ‚Ä¢ Managed updates to CAPEX and Cost-out databases, project accounting, and conducted CIP process reconciliation‚Ä¢ Handled financial record updates in Encore and DFT systems and played a key role in the rolling forecasting and ETE transition process‚Ä¢ Developed daily reports and visual dashboards, facilitating data-driven decisions that improved operational efficiency by 1.3x‚Ä¢ Worked closely with the off shore FP&A team to oversee the consolidation of the budgeted forecast, facilitating dynamic update and modifications across all components of profit and loss statement throughout the forecasting process‚Ä¢ Was responsible for the daily, monthly and quarterly reporting and review‚Ä¢ This included month closing activities towards actual accruals and dynamic adjustments to the rolling forecast and cost out data base.
experience.description_html:
Oversaw accounts reconciliation via ARCS system and contributed to profit planning, leading to improved financial forecasting
• Managed updates to CAPEX and Cost-out databases, project accounting, and conducted CIP process reconciliation
• Handled financial record updates in Encore and DFT systems and played a key role in the rolling forecasting and ETE transition process
• Developed daily reports and visual dashboards, facilitating data-driven decisions that improved operational efficiency by 1.3x
• Worked closely with the off shore FP&A team to oversee the consolidation of the budgeted forecast, facilitating dynamic update and modifications across all components of profit and loss statement throughout the forecasting process
• Was responsible for the daily, monthly and quarterly reporting and review
• This included month closing activities towards actual accruals and dynamic adjustments to the rolling forecast and cost out data base.
